header:
2 ways to get the best over-the-counter recommendation to meet your self-care healthcare needs.

1. Check your symptoms first to be sure you are getting the right recommendation. Use our interactive, actionable, and efficient symptoms elimination and review system. (Highly recommended)

2. Skip to go straight to a pharmacist's over-the-counter recommendation. You would do this if you are very sure about what symptoms you are looking at.

2 ways to get the best over-the-counter recommendation to meet your child's self-care healthcare needs.

 

1. Check your child's symptoms first to be sure you are getting the right recommendation. Use our interactive, actionable, and efficient symptoms elimination and review system. (Highly recommended)

2. Skip to go straight to a pharmacist's over-the-counter recommendation. You would do this if you are very sure about what your child is experiencing.
